Scenario.name: PresencePatrol.Sara
Scenario.description: This DKF is used to assess concepts associated with a Presence Patrol scenario.

performanceNode.name: Patrol Compound Perimeter#Stay close to wall

strategyRef.name: Stay close to wall violation - Stage 1
Stay close to wall violation - Stage 2
Stay close to wall violation - Stage 3

performanceNode.name: Patrol Compound Perimeter#Complete Mission on Schedule
Patrol Compound Perimeter#Complete Mission on Schedule

ns4:message.ns4:content: When the map appears, find the mission briefing on the notepad and read it carefully. Click 'OK' (in VBS) when you're ready to start.

strategy.name: Stay close to wall violation - Stage 1

ns4:message.ns4:content: Do you recall the instructions in the mission briefing? (Press 'M' to review the mission briefing. Press 'Esc' to return to the mission.)

strategy.name: Stay close to wall violation - Stage 2

ns4:message.ns4:content: Maintain cover by staying close to the wall! (stay close but not too close)

strategy.name: Stay close to wall violation - Stage 3

ns4:message.ns4:content: This portion of the wall is lower, so you should crouch to stay covered. Press 'x' to crouch. Press 'c' to stand.
Your head is exposed above the wall! Stay crouched when the wall is too low to keep you covered!
Do you recall the Rules of Engagement from the mission briefing? (Press 'M' to review the mission briefing. Press 'Esc' to return to the mission.)
<b/>Violating RoE is a serious offense, Soldier!<b/>
Remember, this mission is timed. (Press 'M' to review the mission briefing. Press 'Esc' to return to the mission.)
You're behind schedule. Pick up the pace!
You're falling behind - pick up the pace.
Good job - you're back on schedule, keep it up.
